channel.title: Lectures on Programming tools for data science

item.title: Before the first lecture: installation and setup
item.description: 1. Installing R and RStudio 1.1 Installing R We start with installing the latest version of R (3.6.1 as of September 9). R itself is similar to an engine and chassis of a car, that is a bare minimum so that you can start driving. You need to follow steps below: Visit https://cran.r-project.org and click on “Download R for …”, where … coresponds to your operating system. Depending on the operating system: For Mac: download “R-3.

item.title: Supplementary material
item.description: We use this page to add supplementary material for the lectures.
